title: FS:  Raw T206 Johnson and Willis....SOLD!
author: kllrbee

posts.post_title: FS:  Raw T206 Johnson and Willis....SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Hey Guys, 

Johnson hands at chest  (PB)  SOLD!
Has a tear about 1/4" long on bottom left side.  Its about 1/4" from the bottom of card.  Cant really see it from the scan or if card is in a toploader, but its there.  Not exactly sure how that would affect grading, but if not for that, the card is a possible 4 IMHO.  

Willis batting  (PB)  SOLD!
Looks pretty good to me, no creases, Ill let you be the judge, but Id say VG.

Prices include shipping.  Payment via PP gift or money owed, or check or MO please.

Email or PM or reply here.  

[url]thauswirth01@sbcglobal.net[/url]

Thanks Net54!!!
